answerText: quark[10] This theory that describes the strong force describes how strongly-interacting particles are subject to both confinement and asymptotic freedom.
heading: Penn Bowl |2013 | 11 | 19 | Science | Physics | College
subject: Science
question: Question: These particles are not found alone due to their property of confinement. [10] Name these particles that come in three different colors and six flavors, including up, down, top, bottom, charm, and strange. Three of them comprise protons and neutrons.
